item.title: About Me
item.description: My name is Ildi Czeller and I work as a Data Scientist at Emarsys in the Budapest office since I graduated as a mathematician from ELTE. Besides my work at Emarsys I am a mentor and organizer at Techcamp. I am also a proud alumna and supporter of The Joy of Thinking Foundation. List of talks and publications Talks BURN meetup 2017 October: custom ggplot2 theme RLadies meetup 2017 September: shiny introduction RLadies meetup 2017 June: shiny introduction Startup Safary Budapest 2017 April BURN meetup 2016 December: shiny modules Publications Weekend bias in send time optimisation
